content: विधू {5} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab>, {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To shake, move, cause to tremble; वायुर्विधूनयति चंपकपुष्परेणून् <ls>Kavirahasya</ls>; मृदुपवनविधूतान् <ls>Rs. 6. 29</ls>; <ls n="Rs.">3. 10</ls>; दीर्घां वेणीं विधुन्वाना <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To shake off, destroy, expel, drive away; कपेर्विधवितुं द्युतिं <ls>Bk. 9. 28</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 72</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--3@} To spurn, despise, treat with contempt; <ls>R. 11. 40.</ls> {@--4@} To leave, give up, abandon; <ls>N. 1. 35.</ls>
